description: Adapt to whatever comes with a waterproof-breathable shell and a thermal-reflective, insulated liner that can be worn separately or together for ultimate warmth. Adjustable hood, hem, and cuffs, stretch fabric, underarm vents, and multifunctional chest, hand, and security pockets deliver added comfort and utility.
name: Columbia Sportswear Lhotse III Interchange Jacket - Big - Mens

specs.value: Matte Face Windbreaker 100% polyester plain weave
